jd: Hello, This is Anurag from United Software Group. Hope you’re doing good.I was trying to reach you for the roles of .Net Full Stack Developer || Permanent Remote || Contract Position Please have a look at the job, you may reply to this e-mail or call me directly to get in touch with me. Role: .Net Full Stack Developer Location: Los Angeles, CA (Remote work )Duration: 3+ Months Contract Position Description:Qualifications and Skills:• Proficiency in C# (Mandatory skill) with proven experience in software development using this language. Must have Strong Angular Skills• Strong knowledge and hands-on experience with SQL Server (Mandatory skill) for database management and operations. • Expertise in developing and consuming Web APIs (Mandatory skill) for creating scalable services.• Experience with ASP.NET, including MVC and Web Forms, for building dynamic web applications.• Comprehensive understanding of JavaScript for client-side scripting and interactivity.• Proficiency in HTML and CSS for building and styling web pages.• Experience with Angular for building dynamic single-page applications.• Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently and in a team.Roles and Responsibilities:• Design, develop, and maintain robust and scalable web applications using the .NET stack.• Develop and optimize SQL Server stored procedures, functions, and queries to ensure performance and reliability.• Create and manage Web APIs to facilitate seamless integration between different components and services.• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to analyze user requirements and implement technical solutions.• Participate in code reviews to maintain code quality and share best practices with the development team.• Troubleshoot and debug software issues to ensure optimal performance and functionality.• Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies to continuously improve software solutions.• Document technical specifications and provide training to other team members as needed.
